solution_line_template: Then there are {total_seconds}/{time_per_set_seconds} = <<{total_seconds}/{time_per_set_seconds}={num_sets}>>{num_sets} sets of {time_per_set_seconds} seconds.
So, Darma could eat {num_sets} x {peanuts_per_set} = <<{num_sets}*{peanuts_per_set}={total_peanuts}>>{total_peanuts} peanuts.
